text:
It was puzzling to see @MPMarilynGladu push #Chloroquine, when @cathayw pushes against #mefloquine.

 These are same class of #Quinolines-neurotoxicants.

Gladu was happy to parrot Trump & this was a deadly deception to spread untrue claims about the efficacy for #covid19Canada. https://t.co/1PnmVBBNtZ https://t.co/z3iYzaXQsf
